definition[0]: an official document that says that someone is allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
example[0]: We successfully completed the certification for open water diving.
definition[1]: the process of giving someone or something an official document that says they are allowed to do a certain job, that something is of good quality etc
definition[2]: the official act of approving a person, organization, or product and saying that they reach particular standards of ability, quality etc
example[2]: Three prototype jets are currently undergoing tests, but certification by the US Federal Aviation Administration is not expected until next year.
